description: This file defines a ContentService class that provides placeholder asynchronous methods for managing content items, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting content. The class serves as a stub for future integration with a database or repository layer.

classes.name: ContentService
classes.description: Service stub for Content domain with asynchronous placeholder methods.

methods.name: list_content
methods.description: Asynchronous method returning a placeholder list of content items.

methods.name: get_content
methods.description: Asynchronous method to retrieve a specific content item by ID, returning a placeholder.

methods.name: create_content
methods.description: Asynchronous method to create new content, returning a placeholder content record.

methods.name: update_content
methods.description: Asynchronous method to update existing content, returning an updated placeholder record.

methods.name: delete_content
methods.description: Asynchronous method to delete content, returning a simple confirmation payload.
